summary: Most frontend requirements appear implemented: a new Dashboard route/page fetches categories via a backend call and navigates to a pre-filtered Documents view; Documents list supports multi-select and an export action limited to selected items from the currently filtered results; main navigation includes Dashboard/Documents/Upload. The main gap is that the backend API for dynamic category listing (getCategories) is not evidenced in the diff summary for backend/main.mo.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend exposes a method that returns the list of categories available in the system (authoritative category set) for the Dashboard.
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend calls actor.getCategories(), but the backend diff excerpt does not show any public method like getCategories being implemented/exported; only a var persistentCategories is shown. With truncated backend file, the method cannot be confirmed from provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Theme toggle (light/dark) controls and related theme provider integration
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest requirements/non-goals; appears to be additional functionality/UI work.

hallucinated_features.description: Login screen image update to a versioned asset and object-contain rendering behavior
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ; appears as unrelated UI change per file summaries.

hallucinated_features.description: Global styling overhaul with new OKLCH color system tokens and Tailwind theme extensions
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; styling/token changes are unrelated to dashboard/categories/export requirements.
